WorkItem.Description:
Hi, can someone please help me. 

I downloaded and followed the process so that Harvard Anglia would be available but it is not showing up in Microsoft Word.

I downloaded Microsoft Office 365 today, on my dads laptop - Mac 2011 and it doesn't recognise the Harvard Anglia. I really need this asap as I have nearly completed my work and all my references were done on my computer before it stopped working.

Help, please!

Contact me on rudiwescombe@gmail.com

Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Harvard Anglia is still not working - HELP!!!
